  - |-

    <div class = 'norender'><code>
    function setup() {
      let arr1 = ['A', 'B', 'C'];
      let arr2 = [1, 2, 3];

      print(arr1); // ['A','B','C']
      print(arr2); // [1,2,3]

      let arr3 = concat(arr1, arr2);

      print(arr1); // ['A','B','C']
      print(arr2); // [1, 2, 3]
      print(arr3); // ['A','B','C', 1, 2, 3]
    }
